shortdesc.ph: Configuration of the music content center.
Settings for the music content center.
Settings for the music content center.
Settings for the music content center.

plentry.pd: The App ID of the project with the content center enabled.

The RTM Token used for authentication when using the music content center.
We recommend you use AccessToken2 for authentication. See [Deploy Token Server](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/rtm2/android/user-guide/token/token-generation). When generating the token, pass the mccUid as a String to uid.
When your token is about to expire, you can call to pass in a new token.
The user ID for using the music content center. This ID can be the same as the uid used to join the RTC channel, but cannot be 0.
The number of music resources that can be cached, up to a maximum of 50.
App ID of the project that has enabled the content center.

RTM Token used for authentication when using the music content center.
Agora recommends using AccessToken2 for authentication. See [Deploy Token Server](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/rtm2/android/user-guide/token/token-generation). When generating the token, pass a String-type mccUid to uid.
When your token is about to expire, you can call to pass in a new token.
User ID for using the music content center. This ID can be the same as the uid you use when joining an RTC channel, but it cannot be 0.
Number of music resources that can be cached, up to a maximum of 50.
The App ID of the project with the content center enabled.

The RTM Token used for authentication when using the music content center.
Agora recommends using AccessToken2 for authentication. See [Deploy Token Server](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/rtm2/android/user-guide/token/token-generation).
When generating the Token, pass a String type mccUid to uid.
When your Token is about to expire, you can call to pass in a new Token.
The user ID for using the music content center. This ID can be the same as the uid used when joining the RTC channel, but it must not be 0.
The number of music resources that can be cached, up to a maximum of 50.
The App ID of the project with the content center enabled.

The RTM Token used for authentication when using the music content center.
Agora recommends using AccessToken2 for authentication. See [Deploy Token Server](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/rtm2/android/user-guide/token/token-generation). When generating the Token, pass a String type mccUid to uid.
When your Token is about to expire, you can call to provide a new Token.
The user ID for using the music content center. This ID can be the same as the uid used when joining an RTC channel, but it must not be 0.
The number of music resources that can be cached, with a maximum of 50.
